Exclusive Goat Funded market participant Trading Offer

Goat Funded investor, based in Hong Kong, was established in June 2023. It operates as a CFD prop trading firm and lists three program types: Instant, 1 Step, and 2 Steps. Supported trading platforms include MT5, cTrader, Match investor, TradeLocker and Volumetrica FX. The firm reports a review score of 4.3 out of 5 based on 546 reviews. Traders can access the firm
